ideas.headline: Stop Waiting. Start Winning.
ideas.body: Your competitors aren't. Accelerate performance ad iteration from weeks to minutes. Unlock rapid growth and gain a critical edge.
ideas.raw_llm_response:
```json
{
  "ideas": [
    {
      "script_id": "8a1b2c3d-4e5f-6789-0123-456789abcdef",
      "headline": "Stop Waiting. Start Winning.",
      "body": "Your competitors aren't. Accelerate performance ad iteration from weeks to minutes. Unlock rapid growth and gain a critical edge.",
      "cta": "Iterate Faster",
      "keywords": [
        "Ad iteration",
        "Performance marketing",
        "Rapid growth",
        "Ad optimization",
        "Competitive advantage",
        "Scale"
      ]
    },
    {
      "script_id": "b2c3d4e5-f6a7-8901-2345-6789abcdef01",
      "headline": "Prove Your Ad Value. Instantly.",
      "body": "Tired of guessing? Get clear ROI insights and optimize spend in real-time. Maximize efficiency, justify every dollar, every campaign.",
      "cta": "Maximize ROI",
      "keywords": [
        "Ad ROI",
        "Performance analytics",
        "Marketing efficiency",
        "Ad spend",
        "Value proof",
        "Optimization"
      ]
    },
    {
      "script_id": "c3d4e5f6-a7b8-9012-3456-789abcdef012",
      "headline": "Outpace Competitors. Scale Smarter.",
      "body": "Leave slow ad cycles behind. Our platform empowers you to iterate, test, and scale performance campaigns at unprecedented speed. Dominate your market.",
      "cta": "Gain Edge",
      "keywords": [
        "Competitive edge",
        "Scale marketing",
        "Ad testing",
        "Campaign optimization",
        "Rapid scaling",
        "Growth strategy"
      ]
    },
    {
      "script_id": "d4e5f6a7-b8c9-0123-4567-89abcdef0123",
      "headline": "Reclaim Your Team's Time.",
      "body": "Manual ad iteration kills productivity. Automate repetitive tasks and free your performance team to strategize, not just execute. Boost output now.",
      "cta": "Boost Productivity",
      "keywords": [
        "Marketing automation",
        "Team efficiency",
        "Resource optimization",
        "Productivity boost",
        "Ad management",
        "Streamline"
      ]
    },
    {
      "script_id": "e5f6a7b8-c9d0-1234-5678-9abcdef01234",
      "headline": "Cut Ad Waste Now. Drive Real Growth.",
      "body": "Stop pouring budget into underperforming ads. Instantly identify and optimize underperforming campaigns to maximize every dollar. Unlock full potential.",
      "cta": "Optimize Spend",
      "keywords": [
        "Ad waste",
        "Cost efficiency",
        "Budget optimization",
        "Ad performance",
        "Campaign ROI",
        "Growth opportunities"
      ]
    }
  ]
}
```
